titles.title: Travel Related Industries Protection Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend temporarily the excise tax on aviation fuel used in commercial aviation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/3/2008--Introduced. Travel Related Industries Protection Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to suspend for a specified period the excise tax on kerosene and certain liquids used as fuel in commercial aviation.
